name: Spell Projection as Strike
effect: The Base Value of your offensive Spell Projection is the same as your Base Strike Value.

name: Spell Projection as Block or Dodge
effect: The Base Value of your defensive Spell Projection is the same as your Base Block or Dodge Value.

name: Spell Projection as Phenom Projection
effect: The Base Value of Spell Projection is the same as your Base Phenom Projection Value.
